directions: In a small bowl mix together mascarpone, one tablespoon herbs and pepper till well blended. Combine the Cheddar, Havarti and Parmesan in a separate bowl. Top Pretzel Crisps® with a dollop of mascarpone mixture and then sprinkle with cheese blend and remaining herbs.
ingredients: 1 1/2 tablespoons mixed fresh herbs (such as parsley, oregano, thyme, savory, rosemary), divided
16 Garlic Parmesan Snack Factory® Pretzel Crisps®
title: Four Cheese & Herb Bites
